text.tspan: Header: must be first. Build the base operating system that it should
use to build the container. Boostrap agent tells from what kind of
images to start. Docker is the most common.
Variables defined for the build process.
Executed on the host system, after the base OS has been installed.
Usefull to clone repos with user priviliges.
You can also access the container file system.
Allows you to copy files into the container with greater safety .
Shell exectuded inside the container. Allows to download files from
the internet, install new software and libraries, write configuration
Defines environment variables that will be set ONLY at runtime, but
Section executed when the container image is run. You can process
Start an instance "inst1" as a service in background.
Section executed in an instance when the container image started.
You can process arguments within your runscript
Start a shell session inside the running instance "inst1"
Execture interactive commands inside the instance.
